description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.
name: theclique.top_headlines

improvement: The current tool name and description are not very compelling. The user selected it 39% of the time, which is a decent but not outstanding performance. To improve this, we need to make the tool sound more appealing and relevant to the user's needs.
description:
Get the latest news headlines for any topic or country. Easily sort by date and search with keywords. Perfect for news tickers and similar applications.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines on-the-fly, no matter what topic or region you are interested in.

Fetch top stories from anywhere around the world with our fast and reliable API.
name: theclique.top_headlines

improvement: The current tool name and description are not very compelling. The user selected it 39% of the time, which is a decent but not outstanding performance. To improve this, we need to make the tool sound more appealing and relevant to the user's needs.
description:
Get the latest news headlines for any topic or country. Easily sort by date and search with keywords. Perfect for news tickers and similar applications.

Discover top stories from around the world in seconds. Get instant access to breaking news, trending topics, and expert analysis.
name: theclique.top_headlines

improvement: Based on the feedback, it seems that the tool is not as effective as other tools like real_time_news_data.topic_headlines and newsdata.news. We need to make the tool more appealing and relevant to the user's needs.
